content: christmas wreath ornament created by amy sobush - lightkeeper creations difficulty easy size 5 inch diameter abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet materials any worsted-weight yarn a stiff yarn like red heart super saver works just fine in green white and red size g 4 mm crochet hook yarn needle pattern basic ring -with color of your choice i used green chain 20 join to form ring -chain 2 single_crochet in same joining chain -*single_crochet in chain 2 single_crochet in next chain repeat from * around join to top of chain 2 ring formed -chain 2 now you will be crocheting around the ring just formed work approximately 40 double_crochet over ring or an even # the fits around ring slip_stitch in chain 2 fasten_off edging -join edging color i used white in a double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in same double_crochet *skip next double_crochet single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in same stitch repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet if you want a hanging loop chain 10 - 12 slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off trim -embroider french knots i used red around the ring if you run the needle between the layers of the wreath not all the way through to the back of the wreath it keeps the back looking neat also i start at the top & leave long tails on each end to tie for the bow trim fasten_off trim top with a red & white bow weave in ends use your favorite color combos & make many to decorate your tree
